about_the_game:
In the depths of the unknown, where reality bends and horrors lurk, "Shadows of Containment" invites players into the enigmatic world of SCPs. This first-person, found-footage co-op horror game thrusts players into the roles of specialized containment operatives tasked with investigating and securing anomalous entities and objects that defy the laws of nature.

Gameplay:

SCP blends intense horror, strategic gameplay, and immersive storytelling. Players will navigate through haunting environments, from abandoned facilities to ancient ruins, all captured through a realistic found-footage lens that enhances the atmosphere of dread and unpredictability. Communication and teamwork are paramount, as operatives must coordinate to solve puzzles, secure SCPs, and survive encounters with entities of unimaginable power.

Each mission is a dive into the unknown, with procedurally generated levels and dynamic SCP behaviors ensuring no two playthroughs are the same. Players must use their wits, equipment, and unique abilities to adapt to each situation. The game's co-op nature means success relies not just on individual skill but on the ability to work together under pressure.

Features:

Found-Footage Horror: Experience the terror through the lens of your character's camera, adding a layer of realism and immersion to the horror.
Co-op Gameplay: Team up with friends or online allies to navigate the treacherous world of SCPs. Communication and teamwork are your greatest tools for survival.
Dynamic Environments and SCPs: Each mission offers new challenges with procedurally generated levels and unpredictable SCP behavior, making every playthrough unique.
Deep Lore and Storytelling: Discover the dark secrets of the SCP Foundation through found documents, recordings, and environmental storytelling. Each SCP has its own backstory and mysteries to uncover.
Strategic Gameplay: Manage resources, plan your approach to containment, and use your environment to your advantage. Survival requires more than just quick reflexes.

Set in a universe where the abnormal is the norm, players will delve into the shadowy operations of the SCP Foundation, an organization dedicated to the containment and study of anomalous entities and objects. The game's narrative explores the moral and ethical dilemmas faced by those who work in the shadows, tasked with protecting humanity from the unknown at any cost.

SCP offers a heart-pounding, collaborative experience that combines the thrill of horror with strategic gameplay and rich storytelling. Step into the shoes of an SCP operative and face the unknown. Are you ready to secure, contain, and protect?

name: SCP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 or higher with 4GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible

short_description: Dive into the world of SCP's, a co-op horror game exploring the SCP universe. Experience first-person, found-footage terror, securing anomalous entities with teamwork and strategy. Each playthrough brings new challenges and horrors. Are you ready to face the unknown?
